resources.string: Welcome to Java and Aptitude Quiz
2. Every correct answer carry one mark.
3. Reset button will be available after submitting test.
Q1. In how many ways can we select 4 spoons and 3 plates from 8 spoons and 9 plates?

Answer Description:
To make a group of 4 spoons ans 3 plates be made put of total of 8 spoons and 9 plates,
 we have to select 4 spoons from 8 spoons and 3 plates from 9 plates.
 
 No. of ways in which 4 spoons can be selected from 8 spoons = 8C4 = 70
 
 No. of ways in which 3 plates can be selected from 9 plates = 9C3 = 84
 
 No. of ways in which the group can be made = 70 x 84 = 5880
Q2. What should come in place of question mark(?) in the following number series? \n\n18 \t\t20 \t\t44 \t\t138 \t\t560 \t\t2810 \t\t?

Answer Description:
The Pattern of the given series is 20 = 18 x 1 + 2 x 1
 44 = 20 x 2 + 2 x 2
 138 = 44 x 3 + 2 x 3
 560 = 138 x 4 + 2 x 4
 2810 = 560 x 5 + 2 x 5
 
 Ni+1 = Ni x i + 2 x i
 
 2810 x 6 + 2 x 6 = 16872
Q3. What should come in place of question mark(?) in the following number series? \n\n 2 \t\t5 \t\t7 \t\t12 \t\t19 \t\t31 \t\t50 \t\t?

Answer Description:
The Pattern of the given series is
 2 + 5 = 7
 5 + 7 = 12
 7 + 12 = 19
 12 + 19 = 31
 19 + 31 = 50
 31 + 50 = 81

Q6. You have a java file name Test.java. Test.java needs access to a class contained in app.jar in "exam" directory.\n Which of the follwing command set classpath to compile clean?\n Options are
Answer:\n javac -classpath exam/app.jar Test.java is the correct command to set exam/app.jar in classpath.

Q8. Which of the following are Java keywords?
Answer:\nJava keywords are array and boolean. Where Integer is referenced data type.\n there is no java keyword named protect. Java contains access modifier protected.
Q10. Is Java Virtual Machine platform dependent or independent?

Answer:
Platform dependent
 only Java language is platform independent, but its runtime enviroment, or JVM, is platform dependent,
 it is written separately for each OS. So we can say the Java language is platform independent,
 but its runtime environment is platform dependent
